casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Roger BLACKSTOCK 242P09-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Roger Blackstock, for Blackstock. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of June 2017 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017." Ervin, J. recused
